dialog.line: Look at this story in the paper Emma! I just don't get it.
You don't get it? You don't think bullying could lead to suicide?
I just don't see how anyone can get in such a state about being bullied. I mean, to want to go that far....
Sometimes I felt so bad about being bullied I just wanted to die.
My God Emma. What? I.... I dunno what to say? When? I never knew things were that bad.....
Yeah well, It's not the kind of thing you go around shouting about is it?
Yeah, but I mean, well... when?
Not long ago at all actually. Joanne's been making my life sh** for months. She's clever at it, so not many people ever saw what she was doing.
Well I knew she was picking on you, I s'pose everyone did, but she picks on loads of people.
Oh right, and they don't get to feel suicidal so it's only me who's the total wimp?
No I'm not saying that, I just didn't know. I mean let's face it, killing yourself is a bit extreme.
Well I didn't did I, stupid! I wish I never told you now. All I wanted to say was that I did feel really crap and completely alone, so it's not that crazy to want to get out of the situation.
Yeah but to want to kill yourself!
Oh forget it. Maybe you just can't understand if you've never felt like there was nowhere else to go. And I know what you're thinking, I was 'just' attention seeking well....
No, Emma, honest. I mean even if it was to seek attention people don't 'just' do it for no reason. It must have been really lonely for you. It must have been horrible.
It was. And really, when I did start to think about hurting myself it was like a cry for help, but then after a while it was just that I wanted it all over and done with.
That's terrible. But what now, I mean what happened?

I didn't do it obviously! Sorry, I didn't mean to snap at you. In fact it's quite nice to talk to someone about it really. I wouldn't tell anyone before. What happened was someone saw Joanne and me and she was, well, she was making me buy her stuff in the shop, and anyway someone saw and I suppose they told the school and Mr Hannah got involved. I wouldn't say anything at first. I just felt so embarrassed and so worried that it would make things worse, y'know? But I did in the end. I tell you what, I wouldn't keep quiet again. I would tell straight away. All the things I was afraid of just seemed to get worse in my head cos I never told anyone. I thought no one could help or understand but that was rubbish. I hope it never happens again, but if it did I would just tell.
I suppose Joanne wanted you to keep quiet, she was probably just as afraid of you telling someone as you were.
Come on we've got maths now.
(thinking to himself) I can't go back and do something different. I should have stood up for her at the time and now it's too late, how ever many times I say sorry.
